QAData.question: Who won between Leicester City and Southampton on Sun, 22 May 2022 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Leicester City won 4–1 over Southampton on Sun, 22 May 2022 15:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Nathan Redmond completed the most dribbles (2) in the match.
Stuart Armstrong is the most fouled player in the match (4 times).
Stuart Armstrong won the most duels (7) in the match.
James Ward-Prowse completed the most passes (51) in the match.

Jamie Vardy has the least touches (25) of any outfield player.
